#      – Where to put files when calling 'make install'

#      BUILD_SHARED_LIBS
#      – Switch between shared and static libraries

# Configure vfspluginDVP

set(HEADER_FILES 
  include/DLLMainVFSpluginDVP.h
)

set(SOURCE_FILES 
  src/DLLMainVFSpluginDVP.c
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



add_library( vfspluginDVP ${ALL_FILES} )
add_dependencies( vfspluginDVP DVPACKSYS gucefVFS gucefCORE gucefMT )
target_link_libraries( vfspluginDVP DVPACKSYS gucefVFS gucefCORE gucefMT )
set_target_properties( vfspluginDVP PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUCEF_VFSPLUGIN_DVP_BUILD_MODULE" )
GUCEF_config_plugin( vfspluginDVP )


#******** START OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



include_directories( ../../../gucefCORE/include ../../../gucefMT/include ../../../gucefVFS/include ../vfspluginDVP/dependencies/DVPACKSYS/include include )

endif( WIN32 )
